attributes.additional_details: The difference between beauty treatments that are allowed and not allowed, does not make sense. For instance a barber can groom a beard and a tattoo artist can create a wound in the skin, but you cannot have eyelash extensions applied or eyebrows waxed. Having a beard groomed is working on the face, it is no different to having various facial beauty treatments.
attributes.background: Allow beauty salons to open without restrictions so that all treatments can be carried out. Including anything to the face, i.e. eyelash extensions, eyebrow tinting/waxing etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow beauty salons to open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327347

Allow facial treatments (waxing, eyelash etc) in beauty salons now: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331169
